remarks: Closure of the quotient map for a quotient group.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Sep-2015.)
statement:
qusgrp.h $e |- H = ( G /s ( G ~QG S ) ) $.
qusadd.v $e |- V = ( Base ` G ) $.
quseccl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` H ) $.
quseccl $p |- ( ( S e. ( NrmSGrp ` G ) /\ X e. V ) -> [ X ] ( G ~QG S ) e. B ) $.
